chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (src : Name) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ServerNetHandler src m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> out = [] /\ ((exists c : Client_index, src = Client c /\ m = Lock /\ queue st' = queue st ++ [c] /\ (queue st = [] /\ ms = [(Client c, Locked)] \/ queue st <> [] /\ ms = [])) \/ m = Unlock /\ queue st' = tl (queue st) /\ (queue st' = [] /\ ms = [] \/ (exists (next : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue st' = next :: t /\ ms = [(Client next, Locked)])) \/ ms = [] /\ st' = st)

Premises:
Inductive Msg : Set := Lock : Msg | Unlock : Msg | Locked : Msg
ServerNetHandler = fun (src : Name) (m : Msg) => st <- get;; (let q := queue st in match m with | Lock => match src with | Client c => when (null q) (send (src, Locked));; put {| queue := q ++ [c]; held := held st |} | Server => nop end | Unlock => match q with | _ :: x :: xs => put {| queue := x :: xs; held := held st |};; send (Client x, Locked) | _ => put {| queue := []; held := held st |} end | Locked => nop end) : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
Output = Msg : Set
queue = fun d : Data => let (queue, _) := d in queue : Data -> list Client_index
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
tl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
Inductive unit : Set := tt : unit
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record Data : Type := mkData { queue : list Client_index; held : bool } Arguments mkData _%list_scope _%bool_scope
InputHandler_cases : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i st = (u, out, st', ms) -> (exists c : Client_index, h = Client c /\ (i = Lock /\ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = [(Server, Lock)] \/ i = Unlock /\ out = [] /\ held st' = false /\ (held st = true /\ ms = [(Server, Unlock)] \/ st' = st /\ ms = []))) \/ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = []
ClientNetHandler_cases : forall (c : Client_index) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ClientNetHandler c m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> ms = [] /\ (st' = st /\ out = [] \/ m = Locked /\ out = [Locked] /\ held st' = true)
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = [a] -> x = [] /\ y = [a] \/ x = [a] /\ y = []
valid_locked = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pDst p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_locked _%list_scope _%bool_scope
valid_unlock = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pSrc p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_unlock _%list_scope _%bool_scope
LockServ_network_network_invariant = fun p q : packet => (pBody p = Unlock -> pBody q = Unlock -> False) /\ (pBody p = Locked -> pBody q = Unlock -> False) /\ (pBody p = Unlock -> pBody q = Locked -> False) /\ (pBody p = Locked -> pBody q = Locked -> False) : packet -> packet -> Prop
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
hd_error_tl_repr : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A) (r : list A), hd_error l = Some a /\ tl l = r < -> l = a :: r
NetHandler = fun (nm src : Name) (m : Msg) => match nm with | Client c => ClientNetHandler c m | Server => ServerNetHandler src m end : Name -> Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
distinct_pairs_and = fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop Arguments distinct_pairs_and {A}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
locks_correct_update_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held st' = false -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st')
locks_correct = fun sigma : name -> data => forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments locks_correct _%function_scope
nodup = NoDup_cons Server (fun H : In Server (map Client (all_fin num_Clients)) => let H0 : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) -> exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l := fun (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B) => match in_map_iff f l y with | conj x _ => x end in let H1 : exists x : Client_index, Client x = Server /\ In x (all_fin num_Clients) := H0 Client_index Name Client (all_fin num_Clients) Server H in match H1 with | ex_intro _ x (conj H3 _) => let H5 : False := eq_ind (Client x) (fun e : Name => match e with | Client _ => True | Server => False end) I Server H3 in False_ind False H5 end) (NoDup_map_injective Client (fun (x y : Client_index) (_ :...

Inductive step_dup (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_dup net net' [] Arguments step_dup {P params} Arguments StepDup_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_dup {P params} _ [net' p] (_ _)%list_scope

```intros src m st u out st' ms H.
split.
- destruct m.
  + destruct src.
    * unfold ServerNetHandler in H.
      simpl in H.
      destruct (get st) eqn:Hget.
      destruct (null (queue d)) eqn:Hnull.
      inversion H; subst; eauto.
      inversion H; subst. destruct (app_eq_unit (queue st) [c]) as [[Heq1 Heq2] | [Heq1 Heq2]]. subst. eauto. inversion H0.
    * inversion H.
  + destruct (queue st) eqn:Hqueue.
    * unfold ServerNetHandler in H. simpl in H. inversion H; subst. left. exists c. auto.
    * unfold ServerNetHandler in H. simpl in H. inversion H; subst. right. right. left. auto.
  + unfold ServerNetHandler in H. simpl in H. inversion H.
- destruct m.
  + destruct src.
    * unfold ServerNetHandler in H. simpl in H. inversion H.
    * unfold ServerNetHandler in H. simpl in H. inversion H.
  + destruct (queue st) eqn:Hqueue.
    * unfold ServerNetHandler in H. simpl in H. inversion H. subst. repeat split; eauto.
    * unfold ServerNetHandler in H. simpl in H. inversion H. subst. destruct (queue st) eqn:HQ. right. left. eauto. right. right. eauto.
